trustfund:
TF029260-PHRD-POPULATION, HEALTH SECTOR INVESTMENT,TF035510-MAURITANIA - HEALTH SECTOR
            INVESTMENT PROJECT,TF036570-MAURITANIA - HEALTH SECTOR INVESTMENT,TF040801-MAURITANIA: HEALTH SECTOR
            INVESTMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The outcome for the Health Sector
            Investment Project for Mauritania was satisfactory, the
            sustainability was likely, the institutional development
            impact was substantial, and the Bank and borrower
            performance were both satisfactory. Lessons learned from the
            project: A sector-wide approach for health development, when
            feasible, has considerable advantages over the traditional
            investment project. The HIPC initiative has made a strong
            contribution to addressing key issues under the health
            development program. Quite often the supply of services does
            not immediately increase utilization rates. Agreeing on a
            set of monitoring and evaluation indicators for which data
            are available at the base line does not suffice, if at
            mid-term and at project closing comparable and reliable
            information cannot be made available.
